channel.title: MYB
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MYB, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Who Owns The Cloud?: Data Management In A Deglobalizing World
item.description: Countries today face a conflict: Is there a way to maintain data sovereignty while still depending on the data infrastructure of other host nations?

item.title: Blobfish Goes From ‘World’s Ugliest Animal’ To Fish Of The Year

item.title: 4 Ways To Fight The ‘Post-Vacation Slump’—By A Psychologist
item.description: Returning from a vacation can feel like a crash landing. However, small, intentional shifts can make the transition back to daily life much smoother.
